fields.name: TMR_cast
fields.description: Trace metal rosette deployment number from the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition (ACE)
fields.title: TMR cast number

fields.name: date_time[UTC]
fields.title: Date time (UTC)
fields.description: Date and time at which the trace metal rosette deployment began in ISO_8601 format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mi:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: ACE_sample_code
fields.title: ACE sample code
fields.description: Unique sample identifier from ACE, formatted as standardized for the ACE cruise expedition as follows: shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday[UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsampleID

fields.name: latitude[degree_north]
fields.title: Latitude (degree north)
fields.description: Latitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began [degree_north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Latitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: longitude[degree_east]
fields.title: Longtiude (degree east)
fields.description: Longitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began [degree_east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Longitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: depth[m]
fields.title: Depth (m)
fields.description: Depth below sea surface at which the seawater sample was collected [m]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Depth below sea surface at which the seawater sample was collected

fields.name: error_L[nM]
fields.description: Statistical error in L from the Gerringa non linear fitting from ProMCC [nmol]
fields.title: Error in L (nmol)

fields.name: K[mol-1]
fields.title: Log of conditional stability constant for inorganic iron binding ligands (mol-1)
fields.description: Logarithm of the conditional stability constant for inorganic iron binding the ligands [mol-1]

fields.name: error_K[mol-1]
fields.title: Error in K (mol-1)
fields.description: Statistical error in K from the Gerringa non linear fitting from ProMCC [mol-1]
